env.description: The host address (domain) to expose the traefik web interface.

env.name: ACME_CA_SERVER
env.label: ACME CA Server
env.description: The URL of the CA Server to use that supports the ACME protocol

env.name: ACME_EAB_KID
env.label: EAB KID
env.description: Key identifier from External CA

env.name: ACME_EAB_HMAC
env.label: EAB HMAC (Encoded)
env.description: HMAC key from External CA, should be in Base64 URL Encoding without padding format

env.name: ACME_EMAIL_ADDRESS
env.label: ACME Email Address
env.description: The email address to use for the ACME protocol TLS provisioning.

env.name: AUTHELIA_HOST
env.label: Authelia Host Address
env.description: The host address (domain) to expose authelia.

env.name: AUTHELIA_COOKIE_DOMAIN
env.label: Authelia Cookie Domain
